name: Risky Riding
description:
Due to technical reasons, I needed to re-upload this program. It's the first time I've done this, and I didn't include all the files needed to make the game run.  I don't know if this means it can't be part of the Jam, but I hope not. It is completely identical to the game that I thought I had uploaded. 

https://squidmasteriii.itch.io/riskyriding-reupload
